subtitle: These very easy individual desserts are popped under the grill for a caramelised topping.

method.text: Arrange the gooseberries and kiwi fruit in the base of individual heatproof ramekin dishes.
In a small bowl, mix together the cream and yogurt.
Spoon over the fruit. Sprinkle evenly with the sugar.
Place under a preheated medium grill for 2 min or until the sugar caramelises.
Serve immediately or chill until required.

title: Gooseberry and kiwi brulee
